title: New: Oceaán x Låpsley – Need U / This Woman's Work (Live)
body:
With Manchester duo **Oceaán** having to rearrange their UK live shows scheduled for last month due to illness, their Maida Vale session last night was technically their debut UK outing.

Performing tracks from their latest EP out on Chess Club, they also brought along XL signed **Låpsley** for a stunning rendition of _Need U_, mixed with Kate Bush’s _This Woman’s Work_. Check it out below.
